extension.description: Three columns template developed for homepage website Asha-s.com and Soekhan.nl

field.name: explanation1
field.label:
With these variables you can change the lay-out of the template a little bit.
Widthes are % relative to body, body is measured in % or px. General:

field.name: gplusProfile
field.label: G+Profile
field.description: Google+ profile

field.name: bodyWidth
field.label: Width body:
field.description: Width body % or px, other widths are percentages relative to body width. (Add % or px to the value)

field.name: bodyWidthMin
field.label: Minimum width body:
field.description: Minimum width body in pixels

field.name: breakpointMobile
field.label: Breakpoint Mobile:
field.description: Breakpoint body width seen as mobile

field.name: bgImage
field.label: Background image:
field.description: Select a background image.

field.name: bgWidth
field.label: Width background image:
field.description: Width background image, 100 = full screen

field.name: bgTop
field.label: Margin top background image:
field.description: Background image margin top

field.name: bgLeft
field.label: Margin left background image:
field.description: Background image margin left

field.name: bgColor
field.label: Background color:
field.description: Background color #RGB, #000000 = black, #FF0000 = red, #00FF00 = green, #0000FF = blue, #FFFFFF = white, default #080810

field.name: fgColor
field.label: Foreground color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite color of most texts . #RGB, #000000 = black, #FF0000 = red, #00FF00 = green, #0000FF = blue, #FFFFFF = white, default empty

field.name: heightHeader
field.label: Height of header:
field.description: Height of header above left and main column

field.name: headerWidth
field.label: Width header:
field.description: Width header block

field.name: headerPosTop
field.label: Top margin header:
field.description: Position top header block, 0 = top, 100 = (under) bottom

field.name: headerPosLeft
field.label: Left margin header:
field.description: Position left margin header block 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: iconsWidth
field.label: Width icons fb etc:
field.description: Width icons fb etc. as percentage of width page

field.name: iconsPosLeft
field.label: Left margin icons:
field.description: Position left margin icons as percentage of width 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: iconsPosTop
field.label: Top margin icons:
field.description: Position top icons as percentage of height, 0 = top, 100 = (under) bottom

field.name: logo
field.label: Logo image:
field.description: Select a logo image.

field.name: logoWidth
field.label: Width logo:
field.description: Width logo

field.name: logoPosTop
field.label: Top margin logo:
field.description: Position top logo, 0 = top, 100 = (under) bottom

field.name: logoPosLeft
field.label: Left margin logo:
field.description: Position left margin logo 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: areaPosTop
field.label: Top position content
field.description: Top position main content

field.name: leftColumnWidth
field.label: Width left column menu, fb etc:
field.description: Width left column menu icons fb etc.

field.name: leftColumnPosLeft
field.label: Left margin left column:
field.description: Position left margin left column 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: mainColumnWidth
field.label: Width mainColumn:
field.description: Width mainColumn

field.name: mainColumnPosLeft
field.label: Left margin mainColumn:
field.description: Position left margin 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: rightColumnWidth
field.label: Width right column :
field.description: Width right column.

field.name: rightColumnPosLeft
field.label: Left margin right column:
field.description: Position left margin right column 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: footerWidth
field.label: Width footers:
field.description: Width footer as percentage of pagewidth

field.name: footerPosLeft
field.label: Left margin footer:
field.description: Position left margin 0 = left edge, 100 = right edge

field.name: footerPosBottom
field.label: Bottom margin footer:
field.description: Position bottom footer, 0 = bottom

field.name: explanation2
field.label:
Color links and menuoptions #RGB or colorname. #RGB: #000000 = black, #FF0000 = red, #00FF00 = lime, #0000FF = blue, #FFFFFF = white.
Names: yellow, fuchsia, red, aqua, lime, blue, olive, purple, maroon, teal, green, navy, white, black, gray, silver.

field.name: linkColor
field.label: Link color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite color of links . Default empty

field.name: linkDecoration
field.label: Underline link
field.description: Underline link.

field.name: linkHvColor
field.label: Link hover color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite color of link where mouse hovers above . Default empty

field.name: menuColor
field.label: Menutext color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite color of menu text . Default empty

field.name: menuFontSize
field.label: Menu text size:
field.description: Menu text font size (pixels).

field.name: menuDisplay
field.label: Horizontal menu
field.description: Underline menu text.

field.name: menuLineHeight
field.label: Line height
field.description: Line height menu lines

field.name: menuItemWidth
field.label: Width menuitem:
field.description: Width menuitem as percentage of menuwidth, special for horizontal imagemenu, (0 not set)

field.name: menuItemLeftMargin
field.label: Margin menuitem:
field.description: Left margin menuitem as percentage of menuwidth, special for horizontal imagemenu, (empty not set)

field.name: menuDecoration
field.label: Underline menu text
field.description: Underline menu text.

field.name: menuHvColor
field.label: Menu hover color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite color of menu text where mouse hovers above . Default empty

field.name: menuHvDecoration
field.label: Underline hovered menu text
field.description: Underline menu text where mouse hovers above.

field.name: menuActiveColor
field.label: Active menu color:
field.description: If not empty overwrite text color of active menu. Default empty

field.name: menuActiveDecoration
field.label: Underline active menu item
field.description: Underline the active menu item.
